name: CONCAT
description: Joins two or more strings together into a single string.

parameters.name: strings
parameters.description: Two or more strings to concatenate

examples.title: Concatenate names
examples.sql: SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) as full_name FROM users

examples.title: Multiple strings
examples.sql: SELECT CONCAT(city, ', ', state, ' ', zip) as address FROM customers

notes: NULL values are converted to empty strings
